name: T Vines
text: I enjoyed myself and it wasn't crowded but the customer service could have been better.

name: Mitch Moore
text: Has a lot of potential. Place looks nice and the bar has a respectable selection. Just for the love of God and all that is holy DO NOT go on a Thursday...They have this DJ there for kareoke on Thursday and all the dude plays is dubstep. Man cannot read a room for his life and completely ruins the vibe of a pool hall. Bright side is, if you like singing kareoke you'll be the most popular person there for giving the crowd a much desired break from his objectively terrible aux.

resp.text: Thanks for your input.

name: Robert Ware
text: Awesome staff, nice tables with varied sizes, good drink prices and LIVE MUSIC the night I was there.

resp.text: Thank you for nice comments. Hope to see you again, soon!

name: Michael Knotts
text: Good environment, good prices, and overall great experience

name: Victor King
text: It's a cool pool bar.

name: Steviejalapeno
text: Rapid drink service, nice pool tables live music

name: Adam Furman
text: Good basic pool hall with standard drinks, $5 for an hour of pool

resp.text: Thanks for you thoughts!

name: Caleb Richardson
text: Good vibes good fun

name: Chris Looney
text: Chill pool spot.

name: Nicholas Long
text: This place is fun good bartenders inviting atmosphere very well kept place

name: Rick Horner
text: New Hot spot for cold beer and mixed drinks along with great folks and entertainment

name: Shawn Brown
text: The owner is awesome. The bartenders were pretty good too. Just a great place to hang out and have fun

name: D Daniel Koslicki
text: I'm a trucker laid up for the night checked the place out enjoyed my down time.Device was awesome hospitality great Ill be back.thank you

name: Misty Bowman
text: Very good people and place to have a good time...very cold beer and a big selection of liquor!

name: James Terry
text: Had a Blast!!!    I mean cmoc' it's named JT'S PLACE!!!  Nice people, cold Beer,. Friendly spot...   Definitely a cool, pop in spot...

name: kevin brown
text: The people there was friendly its a real nice to go hang out at..

name: Jimmy Stephens
text: Ok place not a big deal good for small town

name: Johnathan Strickland
text: Very good people Mister JT's a good person

name: Frank Casner
text: Nice and laid back.

name: Todd Bowman
text: Ladies night thurs night $1 off all drinks

name: Stacie Weller
text: loved it had a ball

name: brian douglas
text: Great place for darts

name: Michea Simmons
text: Great service

resp.text: So please tell me what you didn’t like to leave a 1 star so we can make it better thank you JT

name: trukinhuny Spahlinger
text: It was okay.

name: Cecilia Rodriguez
text: Its ok......

name: Jennifer Riffee
text: Friendly folks!

name: James Brannon
text: Great Place

name: Jerry Marsh
text: Passed By

name: Joe Summers
text:
The owner treats you like family. Non-smoking in the bar!! (Rare)
The drinks are reasonably priced. The back deck is pretty cool. Pool tables and dance floor and plenty of restrooms

name: CJ Sims
text: Love the new back porch! Very friendly staff and great customer service. Great environment!

resp.text: Thank you CJ! Come back and see us again!

name: Ashley Patterson
text: We went here because the place we originally planned on going was closed on Wednesday. My three friends, one customer, and I were the only patrons at the time. They had free pool that night which was great. The bartender/owner was very friendly and even sat and talked with us for a while. We had a great evening. I hope that this place gets more support in the community, because it's a really great bar. Past owners have been pretty terrible, but if you haven't been since the ownership changed, I encourage you to give it another try!

name: Christopher Stitcher
text: This place was alright. Small but homey. There are 2 pool tables as of Aug 2018. Drinks are a little sweet but competitively priced.

name: becca mahoney
text: Very friendly. We really loved the option of sitting inside or visiting the back porch.

name: Tammy “POSSUM” Bullock
text: Nice Quite little place to have a mixed drink or Beer and play a little pool

name: Philip Cumbie
text: Nice casual atmosphere, good service and great people

name: Boink Doink
text: Misty and Brian are awsome!!  Love this place.

name: Tim Lynn
text: Very awesome !

name: eddie brown
text: Ok

resp.text: Hi Eddie! Thank you for your review! I remember you coming in very well! Let’s chat the next time you come in..Misty

name: Robert Farley
text: 'Best view from a barstool' award winner!! The Sand Bar is now open and is a great place to stop in for  a cold adult beverage. There is live entertainment on occasion...please call ahead to check the music lineup.

resp.text: Thanks for a superstar review. We appreciate you. Our music lineup is on our Facebook page, and we currently have shows Thursday, Friday, and Sunday, all summer.

name: Ray Frye
text: Great place to have a beer during a motorcycle ride. Located off scenic 225 in Baldwin co. Nice folks. Beautiful scenery.

resp.text: We are glad you enjoyed your experience hope to see you again soon.

name: Rachael Landers
text: Angel Cruise is a wonderful bartender. So personable. Great environment

resp.text: We are flattered with all those stars, thank you. Angel is great just like our entire team. Go team!

name: Lisa Adams
text: Best view from a barstool! Excellent people and great happy hour prices. I'll definitely be back 😊😊😊

resp.text:
Oh, you have noticed that we have Happy Hour for EIGHT HOURS a day M-F?
Who does that? The RiverPub!
Lisa we rate you 5 Star too, thanks for the review.

name: David Faulkner
text: Nice neighborhood bar and they have my beer.  Dart board and Saturday kareoke.

resp.text: Glad we have your favorite beer. Thanks for the support. See ya at sunset.

name: RACHEAL ABSHIRE
text: Gorgeous sunset views but it was smoky inside and very slow outside. Probably won't be back unless im fishing.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed our beautiful Tensaw River Sunset. Sorry that it was smokey inside. I'd like to invite you to comeback in the spring/summer for another shot at earning your approval at The SandBar.  We were voted Best Bushwacker by Baldwin's Best in 2018.

name: John Trask
text: The day time bartenders are great .

resp.text: Hey John, we are sure glad you approve, we think our bartenders are great too!

name: Crystal Clemmons
text: Great atmosphere and great service. They have live music, nice selection of beer and yummy pizza! My husband and I had a really great time!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed your experience at Lagniappe’s “Best Bar in Baldwin County” 2019. Try to stop in on Tuesday night for our  Pass the Guitar & tacos. Hope to see you again soon.

name: Charles Bryant
text: Friendly staff, tolerant of drunken idiocy (within reason)

resp.text: Sometimes it be like that.

name: Vito Delorto
text: Just a great place.

name: Susan Wells
text: Nice laid back atmosphere with a beautiful view, great music and attentive staff.

resp.text: Glad you were able to appreciate our "Best View From a Barstool" Hope to see you again soon.

name: Jason Yu
text: Lovely

name: Blake Brown
text: Great place to kill time. Has potential to fill up fast on the weekends.

resp.text: Come-by to kill-time again soon.

name: Maxwell Lawson
text: Just good place to go and relax and have few beers i will be going back

resp.text: Hey, we appreciate you! Hope to see you again soon. #bestviewfromabarstool

name: Connie Anderson
text: Decent music good drinks good people

resp.text: If you are a music fan, come check our our Pass the Guitar on Taco Tuesday. We get started around 7. Thanks for supporting locAL business!

name: MJ Latham
text: So much fun!!! Relaxing and great to hang out or drink a beer with friends

resp.text:
MJ, if only there was an awesome place to throw a fabulous birthday party nearby, haha.
Thanks for the stars, we think you are Five-Star too.

name: Barefoot Mike and Nelly The Irish Wolfhound
text:
As stated previously, Google Maps is a little off on this one. Bar is by the water.
Friendly local spot. Live music is offered by local and out of state talent. Fun place to visit.

resp.text: Hey Barefoot, thanks for the review, glad you were able to experience our "Best View From a Barstool".

name: Fred Applegate
text: Want to thank ya'll for helping the combat vets dice run

resp.text: We love our Veterans & enjoy hosting the run annually. ♥️🇺🇸

name: Rhonda Watts
text: I don't go here and when I have it's been way to crowed and fights break out

resp.text:
Rhonda, sorry you were less than satisfied with your RiverPub experience. We do get busy at times and on rare occasions alcohol equals drama. We have a ZERO TOLERANCE Policy with anyone being rowdy or disrespectful. I hope that you will visit us again and we are able to prove we are "Chill Establishment". Regardless, we appreciate your supporting other locAL businesses.
Respectfully,
The RiverPub

name: Jeremy Crane
text: It definitely has the best view around.  Friendly environment and very reasonable on prices.

resp.text: Jeremy, Did you know our Happy Hour is so Happy it lasts 8 hours? Thanks for the review, glad you had a great experience at the "Home of the Half-Mile Smile".

name: Adam Goodman
text: Good people that run the place and awesome view of river

resp.text: What a nice compliment, we sure do love our RiverPub Crew. Glad you do too.

name: Glen White
text: Looks great 👍,they weren't open 😣

resp.text: Oh no Glen, I am sorry we weren't open when you stopped by. We are open 364 days a year at 11am and Christmas Day at 3pm. Thanks for the review. Hope to see you soon.

name: Louie Willie
text: Nice little bar. Cheap drinks!! Had a blast!! Will return!!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed our cheapness, haha. We have a Happy Hour that just won't quit, 8 full Happy Hours. Thanks for the great review. See ya soon.

name: markus faulk
text: Cozy place and a nice view of the river! !

resp.text: Glad you were able to take in the beauty of our beloved Tensaw River through our picture windows.

name: Penny Rauhuff
text: Great fun

resp.text: We appreciate you Penny. Thanks for all the gold stars.

name: john plemons
text: Great atmosphere, kind people.. Great view ofthe river.

resp.text: John, did you know that we are located on the widest a stretch (1/2 mile) of the Tensaw River?  Glad you enjoyed the RiverPub, Home of the Half-Mile Smile.

name: Joe Key
text: Great view great atmosphere cold beer.

resp.text: Did you know, Joe, that we are located on the widest stretch (1/2 mile) of the Tensaw River? Thanks for the stars.

name: Windy Hale
text: Well I'm giving two stars for it's cool there's volleyball activities. Food is lousy, place is filthy..look at the walls & ceiling.

resp.text:
Sorry that you didn’t enjoy your experience, though I am unsure you were at The RiverPub at Cliff’s Landing.
Our Baldwin County Department of Health score is 100 and publicly posted. Also, the only food we serve are “frozen” pizza, burgers, and assorted chips. We are a drinking establishment not a restaurant. We open our SandBar each spring & have a tiki bar and “beach sand.” We don’t have a volleyball court, Tropics (located about 15 minutes south of us) on the Causeway does. I fear you may have confused our businesses.
Respectfully,
The RiverPub at Cliff’s Landing

name: Gregory Sims
text: Had a blast all weekend  long

resp.text: Glad to hear it Mr. Sims.

name: Denise Clark
text: So peaceful to sit in the window and watch the river go by.

resp.text: Our favorite pastime is watching the river flow. Thanks for the five-star review of The RiverPub - Home of the Half-Mile Smile.

name: susan peacock
text: Luv this place!!!

resp.text: Susan, You are definitely "in the know" thanks for your support. You da best!

name: Amy Bingham
text: Nice place,  great view of the river

resp.text: We are located at the widest point of the beautiful Tensaw River. Home of the Half-Mile Smile.

name: Tiffany Head
text: Great view overlooking the river!

resp.text: Tiffany, did you know that we are located at the widest point (1/2 mile) of the Tensaw River? Thanks for supporting locAL businesses.

name: Debbie Irwin
text: Had an awesome time

resp.text: Debbie, we are so glad you enjoyed our place, thanks for the 5 stars.

name: Catherine Crosby
text: Best damn view EVER!

resp.text:
Yes, yes, yes! When ya know, ya know.
Thanks for supporting locAL and your 5-stars. You rock.

name: Brian Logan
text: Great place with great views

resp.text: Glad you found the "Best View From a Barstool" to be a 5-Star experience. Thanks for supporting small businesses.

name: Gary Barnett
text: The best people the best view

resp.text: We sure do love our RiverPub Crew and customer family. Thanks for the stars Gary.

name: Bubbi Treefellow
text: Funny people

resp.text: Thanks for the five-stars and for your locAL support.

name: Sexy Bit420
text: Beautiful scenery

resp.text: We sure do love our Tensaw River view, thanks for the review.

name: Vincent Hambaugh
text: Relaxing environment

resp.text: We know how to chill. We are glad you enjoyed your experience, thanks for the five-star rating.

name: Michael Carroll
text: Best view you will get from a bar stool

resp.text: Thanks so much for the five-stars Michael, we appreciate your support of locAL business.

name: Jeremiah Hollowell
text: Awesome place.

resp.text: Why thank you Jeremiah, we appreciate your locAL support.

name: spirit g
text: Google is screwed up,  the bar is actually on the boat ramp.  Friendly hole in the wall.  One of only a couple places in the county that can sell alcohol on a Sunday

resp.text: Spirit, glad you found us anyway. We have often been called Baldwin County's Best Kept Secret. Welcome to the club.

name: David Wright
text: Great Music and friendly people

resp.text: Have you checked out of Tuesday night Pass the Guitar with Paul Shuler and Friends? Its an open mic night that offers a diverse sampling of the locAL talent. Everyone is welcome, and we have tacos.

name: Steve Stanley
text: Enjoyed the lunch special at Jockers today.  Excellent curries.  I love their Indian dishes so I haven't tried the American dishes. Service was fast and courteous.  The atmosphere is great for a business meeting or dining with friends.

resp.text: Great choice of having authentic Indian dishes. We are open for lunch from 11am to 2pm and dinner from 4pm until 9pm and Friday/Saturday 10pm. Sunday 12-5pm. We have two cuisines American and Indian. We provide courteous, friendly and fast service in a relaxing atmosphere with quality, fresh and value for money meals. The restaurant offers signature drinks and cocktails.We cater for all types of guests- business , family, reunion, meetings, casual and groups. Thank you for your business.

name: Cynthia Payne
text: It was delicious and fast. Not very many customers so waitress was very attentive and knowledgeable of the menu except that I ordered a salad and they were not taking orders for salads.

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Pleased you enjoyed your meal in a great atmosphere with fast and friendly service. All our staff are trained to know our menu items and explain to our valuable guests. Salads are presently not available.

name: Jay O
text: The food was outstanding, the service was on point. It was refreshing to eat a quality meal. The staff is great...always checking on ya...owner was exceptional...visited and made sure food was delicious.  Very clean.

resp.text: Awesome. Thank you for your five star rating. We strive for excellence with every dish served and guest. We ensure that our dishes are prepared freshly per order. Your are absolutely right about our employees- friendly, polite, attentive, helpful with every guest. We appreciate your business.

name: Visaboy M.
text: I only experienced their Philly Fries and some type of desert. Philly Fries were amazing. Not very expensive.

resp.text: Appreciate your review. Loaded Philly Fries are our signature dish. Very popular with our valuable guests. We offer variety of deserts that our guests order after have a delicious meal. Thank you for visiting our restaurant.

name: Hunter Waldman
text: My wife, a friend, and I went to try the Indian Cuisine at Jokers for Lunch today. It was excellent. I love Indian food and am a tough critic, but it was the best Indian I’ve ever had. Rick came out and talked with us (great guy) and we’ve been begging the Shoals area to get an Indian restaurant. Super pumped about this place and hoping to get them more visitors. If you are unsure of what to order, you cannot go wrong with Chicken Tika Massala. It’s a very “safe” first time order. Excellent food overall.

resp.text: Awesome! Thank you for your feedback. It was absolutely pleasure serving your party. Definitely Chicken Tikka Masala is favorite Indian cuisine around the world. Our chef cooks each meal per order, therefore, fresh quality ingredients and appetizing. We will extend our menu as business grows giving our valuable guests more choices to ensure we can meet their palate. We appreciate your loyalty.

name: Rikesh Patel
text:
Love the upscale feel and atmosphere with a great twist.

Their cocktails are great and the lighting is really cool around the bar area.

It is nice to know that there are different cuisine options in the Shoals.

Great draft beer options and entertainment. This will be a regular spot from now on.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate your business. We offer Indian and American cuisine to suit every guests needs. We are pleased to do restaurant business in the Shoals area. Variety of cocktails, beer and music offered daily.

name: Sam Carpenter
text: Never been to a more funner place then this club. The bartender Jake gave me the best drinks and he was hilarious! He made my experience much more enjoyable we always take great care of him when we are there on saturdays. Every Saturday is a routine for me and the guys and this place has won me over

resp.text: We appreciate your loyalty to Jokers Bar and restaurant. We have variety of drinks and specialty cocktails. Jake is a wonderful bartender like rest of our team. He does create a great experience for our valuable guests. See you next Saturday. Thank you.

name: April De Luna
text: My husband and I went here to eat Indian food and that we did. We was so pleased with the waitress Bret is her name I believe. And the food was Awesome... We will absolutely be back time and time again. Thank you Chef Ram..

resp.text: Thank you for coming over to our Jokers restaurant. Absolutely our food is the finest in the area. Pleased you enjoyed your Indian dishes, which is very authentic. Your server Brett is very friendly, polite, helpful like rest of our valuable servers. We look forward to your next visit. We pass on your comments to Ram, chef.

name: Michelle Poston
text: We are from out of town visiting family, the butter chicken was good/ok. But, not much chicken, it was mostly sauce. Small portions of rice too.

resp.text: We appreciate you trying out our establishment for authentic Indian dishes. Our butter chicken is a very popular dish. Sorry you felt there was not enough chicken. We serve extra rice rice on request. We hope you visit us again and any concerns please let us know. Thank you for your business.

name: Beverly Emerson
text: Food Good and lots of space. Room outside and great dance

resp.text: Wonderful. Yes we have a great outdoor patio with a stage and 2 bars with plenty of seating facilities. Also there is enough space for people to enjoy the music and dance the night away! This all compliments our Indian/ American cuisine- great choices of freshly cooked dishes. Hope you enjoyed the band last night.

name: Melissa Littrell
text: First time at Jokers.  Food was great abd the music of Tremayne was awesome!  They need to be your house band!

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Tremayne are an excellent band playing variety of popular songs. The crowd at Jokers had a great time listening and dancing to their music. As you mentioned we have awesome selection of food with American and Indian menu selections. We have live entertainment on Friday or Saturday check our Facebook page.

name: David Ellis
text: My wife and I love Indian cuisine, and this is excellent and authentic! We have had been searching for a place since the good one in Madison closed.

resp.text: Thank you for your visit to Jokers to eat our delicious Indian meal. We are glad to bring Indian cuisine to the Shoals. The menu consists variety of Indian delicacies. We appreciate your business.

name: Jake Miller
text: Great upscale atmosphere with the best bartenders in the 256! Owners and management are very friendly. Food is AWESOME. would highly recommend and would give 10 stars if it was a option!

resp.text: Wow… appreciate the valuable feedback. We have team of people from management to employees. They take care of each guest.

name: Larry Hardy
text: Great food and atmosphere definitely will go back. I recommend it to everyone. That have Indian and American food and both are amazing

resp.text: We look forward to your next visit to the Jokers serving both American and Indian cuisine. Our decor is very contemporary and unique. Thank you for your review.

name: Andy modi
text: Ordered Chicken Tikka 555 and it was an awesome experience. Joker reminded me of my good old days in India

resp.text: Wonderful! Chicken tikka 555 is a specialty dish created by our chef. It is a very popular dish. Pleased you enjoyed the Indian we have created with authentic Indian cuisine.

name: Brandy Massey
text: Something new & unique to the area with the Indian food! Good atmosphere & people that owns it! I do believe this business will last,and as a community we need to uplift these owners and employees so they will succeed! 😌😌

resp.text: Thank you for your support. Great food and ambiance. Yes we’re here to ensure we serve the community with delicious food with excellent service.

name: Tyler Foreman
text:
Both voodoo, and joker burgers are fantastic.
Fish & chips are bomb af.
Lamb Curry is everything.
Glad this place came to the shoals to bring some variety to the area.

resp.text: Wow wonderful you enjoyed variety of cuisine both American and Indian. Our burgers are specifically formulated for our restaurant. Fish and chip a great British tradition made fresh cod. Great with splash of malt vinegar. All our curries of great taste mainly chicken, lamb, fish or vegetables. Thank you for your business and hope to see soon.

name: Pace Forrest
text: Waitress was very nice and kept us taken care of. Food was well cooked and the building itself looks very nice.

resp.text: We have the finest team in the Shoals at Jokers. Our team are very friendly, polite and helpful with great service and food. Thank you for your business.

name: Garret Cox
text: Cool atmosphere, delicious food and drinks. On top of normal fare (burgers, etc) they have delicious indian cuisine! Try the chicken tikka masala and naan bread!

resp.text: Fabulous! Yes you are right Chicken Tikka Masala is a very popular authentic Indian dish made with creamy gravy with various spices. Our naan bread is cooked freshly in tandoor ( clay oven)- you can have plain, butter, garlic/butter or chilly naan, choice is yours. Our signature burger is Jokers Burger specially created by our chef. We appreciate your business. Thank you.

name: Austin Lee
text: I cant leave a biased opinion on the establishment. The reason i am biased is i really dont have the liking for indian food. But they do have other options. Worth the try if u do like the food

resp.text: Yes you are correct we have 2 cuisines- American and Indian cuisine. The choice is yours. Thank you for your feedback.

name: John Chase
text: I rounded up my family and came here for lunch today based on this web page and the sign out front showing that they should be open.  The place looked closed, no cars, and no one answered the phone.  I was disappointed.  But,  the manager called me later to explain they were open but he was in the back and had no customers yet so they looked closed.  I will try again soon and try the door even if they look closed!

resp.text: We are open today 11am to 9pm. Everyday we are open Tuesday to Thursday 11am to 9pm, Friday and Saturday close at 10pm . Sundays 12pm-6pm. Closed on Mondays. These are restaurant times. Hope to see you at these opening times. Our management spoke to you earlier. Thank you.

name: Ryan Swindle
text: Very nice new restaurant in our area. Lots of variety on the menu.

resp.text: Absolutely newest restaurant in the Shoals area. We cater for all authentic Indian and American cuisine in a great atmosphere. Thank you for your patronage.

name: Michelle White
text: Affordable and delicious. One of the best burgers I've ever had.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Our burgers are the best in the Shoals. We have our signature Jokers Burger - very popular with our guests. Great food at affordable prices.

name: ALEX P
text:
Exceeds Expectation!

Meat and veggies freshness and quality guaranteed, ingredients and spices adequate quantity, superb menu instructions and result, tasty and satisfying, excellent and prompt customer service!!!

resp.text: Excellent five stars rating! We appreciate your business. We serve both American and Indian cuisine at highest quality and freshness. We have many  of dishes choices for every consumer palate. All our team members provide finest service in the restaurant/ bar industry.

name: Martin Dean
text: We have Indian food in the Shoals! WOOHOO! it was very good, the Samosas were divine, Chicken Curry, off the chain. Go, expand your horizons!

resp.text: Yes we’re are glad to bring Indian cuisine to the Shoals. Glad we made your choice of palate. We offer variety of dishes.

name: Jacob Hodgson
text: I can't attest to the atmosphere, but the Lamb Vindaloo that I just got for lunch take-out is worth the five stars on its own.

resp.text: Great. Pleased that you enjoyed your lamb vindaloo- obviously you enjoy hot spicy dish. You should try our popular dish of chicken tikka Masala. Thank you for your your take-out order.

name: Deanna Jackson
text: Amazing food great service. We have been there many tine

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely appreciate your continued support by frequently coming to our Jokers restaurant/bar. We certainly have amazing food and great selection on our menu.

name: Timothy James
text: Nice place.  Great food and friendly staff.

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed your food and service at Jokers. We offer variety of American and Indian cuisine. Our staff are absolutely friendly and polite.

name: Allison Mackey
text: Went on a Friday night for dinner. We had cocktails, the vegetable samosas, veggie curry, chana masala (chickpeas), and gulab jamun. STELLAR food. Hopefully the service will improve (took a very very very long time to get our food.) Also looking forward to the full Indian menu availability. I appreciated that Indian music was playing as we ate. Super friendly staff. Will eat here again!

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Our Indian menu is very highly recommended by our valuable guests like yourself. We will be extending our menu in the near future. We apologize for delay in serving your meal. We cook fresh food, so it takes time to prepare and execute. Appreciate your business.

name: Terri Whalen
text: The food was awesome - veg samosas, chicken 555, shrimp pakora, saag paneer, chicken curry, - all excellent! Garlic nan was very flavorful.  The mixed drinks were exceptional.  The raita was a bit thin for my preference but had great flavor.  Rice was perfect. They are still working from a limited menu so looking forward to going back again to try some other dishes.  So happy to have Indian as a local option - it is one of our favorite cuisines and we always had to travel to get it.  (We did have a rather long wait time to get our food but I think that is reflective of a new venture...I’m sure they will work out the kinks with time.)  Definitely recommend for great Indian good.

resp.text: Fantastic 5 stars review. We offer variety of Indian cuisine. Pleased you enjoyed your dishes ordered. Thank you for your understanding of delay in food. Our naans are freshly made in tandoor. All our meals are made freshly, cooked to order. We look forward to seeing you on your next visit.

name: Timothy Whalen
text:
The food here is excellent. It's at least as good as any Indian food I've had in Nashville, Birmingham, or Huntsville. The chicken 555, vegetable samosas, and shrimp pelota we're tasty and well prepared. Saag Paneer, Chicken Curry, and Lamb Korma had delightful subtle flavors. The meats were succulent. Gulab Jamun was chewy on the outside creamy on the inside in a sweet but not cloying honey sauce.
The reason for only four stars is they are new so it took a long time for the food to come out, the servers didn't know the menu very well, and they seemed confused. Once they get their systems running more smoothly they'll be 5 starts for sure!

resp.text: Thank you for your visit to Jokers to try out our Indian cuisine. We serve variety of appetizers, entrees and desserts. Our meals are cooked fresh and takes time to delivery to your table. We look forward to your next visit.

name: Sonia Patek
text: Very friendly place. Love Indian food. Everything is extravaganza❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️

resp.text: We appreciate your feedback. It was a pleasure serving you with authentic Indian cuisine. Pleased you enjoyed our friendly service, great atmosphere, delicious Indian food and ambiance.

name: Markesha Hackett
text: Go get you a Mother Clucker Chicken sandwich or fish and chips!!! Omg sooooo good!

resp.text: Yes it is gray choices of meals. Fish and Chips is very popular. Thank you for your feedback.

name: Kennedy English
text: Service is slow and management seems indifferent. Alcohol was served to obviously patrons that were clearly to inebriated to drink more.

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Our food is cooked fresh therefore may take slightly longer to deliver to your table. Very confusing about management comment, we get compliments on our management interaction with our valuable guests. Every individual has there own tolerance on consumption of alcohol, we do not control people’s habits!

name: Keith Cantrell
text: Great food, great atmosphere, nice service! Gotta check out the live music!

resp.text: Wonderful. Thank you for your review. Glad you enjoyed your visit to our bar and restaurant. Check out our Facebook for live entertainment weekly.

name: Sherri Casinger
text: Food was great loved the atmosphere of the place and great service

resp.text: Thank you for your review. Excellent that you enjoyed your meal. Our facility offers great ambiance in a contemporary surroundings. We have very friendly, polite and helpful team members to serve you. Appreciate you coming to our restaurant/ bar.

name: Ron Almy
text: Although , not opened(opening is scheduled for March 15 )it'll contain a sports themed atmosphere, several bars and a family friendly restaurant with quality foods and an authentic        Indian style menu.

resp.text: We are open now with American and Indian restaurant with great cocktails, beer and music. Come and check us out.

name: Tamera Johnson
text: The music could have been better

resp.text: Thank you for your feedback. Let us know on your next visit- suggestions on music of choice.

name: Jackson Lane
text: I am the kitchen manager so I'm a little biased. I think were good.

resp.text: We are the best!

name: Benjamin Reed
text: This is a great place for the Shoals Area.

resp.text: Absolutely we are here for longevity in the Shoals area.

name: Trish Haynes
text: Food made all of my friends sick. Staff/drinks  were awful. Got thrown up on when walking to bar area.

resp.text: Sorry to hear about your visit. Usually food incidents occur after 24 hours of consumption. Hope you guys are doing well.

name: Heber Melendez
text: Had a great time there

resp.text: Thank you for visiting us at Jokers of the Shoals. Glad you enjoyed your time at our restaurant/ bar. Thanks for your five star review.

name: Shane Lee
text: Great service and the food was good

resp.text: Excellent. Appreciate you coming to Jokers for friendly and courteous service. We have both American and Indian menu. Thank you.

name: Callie Perry
text: Lots of good music and dancers

resp.text: We provide fabulous music and definitely food. Try out our menu for choice of Indian or American dishes.

name: Tj Keller
text: Uh I’m confused 8$ brownie and it took 8 hrs and the owner had the audacity to tell me to have a nice day after that nope

name: Marcus Jones
text: It was alright probably  won't last long

resp.text: What do you mean? We have many compliments on our business whether it’s restaurant food or bar service.

name: Brittany Payne
text: Nice environment

resp.text: Superb 5 star rating. Absolutely very colorful decor and atmosphere. Appreciate your feedback.

name: D'Angelo Anderson
text: Great

resp.text: Thank you for your business. Appreciate you enjoyed your visit to the Jokers with Indian food.

name: Bernie Mettenberger
text: Finally, real Indian food in the Shoals. Tandoori Chicken was great. Margaritas were pretty good, but are the smallest I've seen.

resp.text: Great! Yes we are getting many new guests trying out Indian cuisine and others who have tried Indian food elsewhere before. Tandoor Chicken is cooked in a special Tandoor ( clay oven) with spices. This is a very popular appetizer dish. We have variety of beers including Kingfisher from India, domestic/ foreign and IPA beers, spirits, signature cocktails. Thank you for your patronage.

name: JT
text: Wish You Were Beer is a nice beer hall. Tons of local and import beers on draft and a nice home brew selection.  I've seen a couple if live bands there.  There isn't food option but you can bring yours or order in.  Everytime I've been there has been a good time!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Jeff!

name: George Ford
text: Great craft beer on tap and so many to pick from. Cellared craft beer also available. Live entertainment on certain nights. Check for events on their Facebook page. Great place for some of the best craft beers around.

resp.text: Thank you, George!  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Justyna Mudy-Mader
text: Nice clean good atmosphere to go drink beer🍺 and hang with your family or friends! They have every so often life shows that you can enjoying even more!! So many options of 🍺 🍺 beers🍺 beers 🍺 you can ask and for small shot for simple of the 🍺 before purchasing 😁😋😁 Very nice ppl working there 😊😊😊 don't miss to check it out and have some good time 😊

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words, Justyna!  We're really glad you love our place.  We hope to see you again very soon! - Damon Eubanks, owner/GM

name: Brett Rogers
text: One of the best places in Huntsville to have a beer. Usually there is a awesome selection on draft, with a selection of cans and bottles. I haven't had food from here but I know the offer a small menu. They have a nice patio, a pool table, plenty of seating, and a stage for live music. A good stop in the 805 area.

resp.text: Thank you, Brett!  We look forward to seeing you again soon.

name: Punk Master
text: Great atmosphere and great selection of hard to find beers (40 when I was there). Clean facility with love music and outdoor seating. Great place to drink beer and hang out. Live music and a clean clear feel to the place. They also have a pool table and outdoor seating.

resp.text: Thank you, Punk Master!  Great username by the way.

name: Darlene Mosley
text: The beer selection is great, but my husband and I have been in 4 or 5 times, (we live over an hour away). Every time we've been in the service has been mediocre at best. None have been actually rude, a better word might be indifferent. They do not seem interested in selling at all. They seem to be more interested in their phones than in customers. You have to call them over if you need them. It was not the same person on each visit. If I were the owner of this business, I would be looking for some friendlier workers who care about their workplace.

resp.text: Darlene, I am very sorry to hear about this experience you have had repeatedly.  This is inexcusable and I have already shared your review with my staff and have implemented a zero tolerance policy for personal cell phone usage at work.  As with any small business, customers must be the top priority over all else.  I hope you will return again soon and give us another chance.  I assure you this will not happen again.  If you care to share more about your experience, I would appreciate your feedback.  My email address is info@wishyouwerebeer.net.  Thank you for your business. - Damon Eubanks, Owner/GM

name: Mallory Johnston
text: Staff is hit or miss.  When it is a slow night and they want to go home (even though they don’t close for a couple of more hours), it is very obvious they do not want customers there.  Also prices have increased as Campus 805 has become more popular and as their Madison business started to struggle (which is now gone).  Best of luck.

resp.text:
Mallory,

I'm very sorry our staff made you feel unwelcome.  There is absolutely no excuse for that.  We are open for business right up until our posted hours say we close and you are always welcome.  I personally instruct staff to NEVER "last call" our customers.  Has this occurred more than once?  I would appreciate further information on this issue if you don't mind.  Could you email me at info@wishyouwerebeer.net with the night you visited so that I can address the problem with my staff?  I would certainly appreciate it.

I would like to address a couple other issues you mentioned though.  The only time prices would increase is when a particular product price is raised from wholesaler to us.  We do not simply raise prices arbitrarily on everything in house.  I would be happy to look into something in particular if you care to let me know.

The other issue is with the former Madison store, which is not "gone" per se.  We sold that store to another couple and they decided to change the name of the business to Madison Taproom.  It still exists, but under new ownership and name now.  It is important to me to make that distinction between selling a business and simply going out of business (which did not happen).

Your business is very important to us.  I gather from your comments that you have been a customer of ours in the past and I would love to keep that relationship strong.  Please contact me so that I can help make things right.  Thank you.

Damon Eubanks, Owner (WYWB)

name: Trystan May (Duke02)
text: The people there were very nice. Food was good, although I wish they had more of a selection for those of us underage. Events they put on were well liked.

resp.text: Thank you, Trystan!  We're looking to add more food options very soon.

name: Chris Spalding
text: Wish You Were Beer is the best bar at Campus 805, and you're missing out if you don't go here. They have a spectacular selection of local and non-local beers on draft, and a pretty good selection of local beers in cans and bottles, including lots of rare and limited production stuff. They also have a ton of great home brewing gear and materials. SUPPORT YOUR LOCAL BUSINESSES. Go here.

resp.text: Man!  I'm blushing.  Thank you for the kind words, Chris.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: D. Hooks
text: Great beer.  Amazing experience.  The kind of place you keep wanting to go back to.

resp.text: Thank you!

name: CTBamaFan
text: This location has an amazing 40 taps of craft beer selection. Great environment and friendly staff.

resp.text: Thank you, CTBamaFan!

name: Andrew Fandre
text:
It's like they don't want you there... I was greeted and then promptly ignored. Servers passed my by several times while chatting with the other patrons. I'm not a stickler, but if you walk past me several times when I don't have a drink, I'm going to take it personally. I got the vibe of don't bother us, we're with the regulars. When I finally got adamant then it was like oh sorry, we're busy... When everyone else had drinks. Not exactly standing room only in here. Now I know why.

Train your staff and serve quickly and efficiently you might get my business again. Treat me like this again and you will die an ignominious death.

resp.text:
Hi Andrew.  I am very disappointed you had such a negative experience last night.  Although we were fairly busy, that's certainly no good excuse for poor service.  A 1-star review is certainly no laughing matter for a small mom and pop business.  WYWB is how we make a living after all, not simply a hobby or minor investment. I am also disappointed, Andrew, because I know you and you know me, and you have been to both of my businesses on several occasions.  Therefore, I consider YOU a regular and I definitely appreciate your business more than words can say.  You have never written a negative review of either of our stores in the past that I am aware of, so this one is particularly troubling. I have to wonder if all of your experiences have been this bad.  I certainly hope not!

I was there at the store last night and did see you briefly as I was helping set up our food vendor outside.  I was not aware you were having so much trouble with my staff over at the bar. I wish you had said something to me directly so that I could have made a correction on the spot.  As unfortunate as this review is,  I still appreciate your time and feedback.  I will address your issues with my staff today and make necessary corrections to make sure this does not happen again.  I am eager to make this right and invite you to come back and have a beer on me and would love to discuss in person.  I am almost always here.  Cheers. - Damon Eubanks

name: Drew Winstel
text: Great place to have a beer. Friendly people (ask Chris what happened to Hoppy the Clown) and great beer make a great combo. If you're buying cans/bottles to take home, hit the Madison store, though.

resp.text: Haha!  Thanks, Drew!

name: Stephanie and Dean
text: Love hanging out here.  Great place for beer and plenty of choices!

resp.text: Thank you, Stephanie!  See you again soon.

name: carlzcomedystuff standup
text: Always good...never had a single issue and they always have something I like

resp.text: Thank you, Carl!  See you again soon!

name: Michael Sims
text: Just got done eatin there, it is a great place to find good cooking and good service to talk to!

resp.text: Thanks, Michael!  Glad you had a great visit.  See you again soon!

name: Wil Bowman
text: Cool spot, and nice selection. Plenty of parking. I would prefer prices be more cash friendly.

resp.text: Thank you, Will.  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Phil Nichols
text: Not many food options available here, but trivia was fun. Beer selection was ok. Service was... minimal

resp.text: Thank you, Phil.  I'm glad you enjoyed trivia.  We're working on adding food options.  We don't have a kitchen, but we're trying to find some creative options there.  I'm disappointed to hear service was lacking.  I will be sure to speak with our staff about that.  Hope you'll come see us again soon.  Take care. - Damon Eubanks, Owner

name: Victoria Gray
text: Awesome place and an absolute must do if you are anywhere near huntsville.  Micro brewery site with several different brewers set in a repurposed school with hipster interiors

resp.text: Thanks, Victoria!

name: Paula Dickerhoff
text: Nice little place.  Good selection on tap.  Sometimes they have music 😁

resp.text: Thank you, Paula!  Come see us again soon.

name: Alex Tomlinson
text: Great beer selection on tap. Home brewing supplies on sale. Live music as well. Fun!

resp.text: Thank you, Alex!

name: Trevor Rude
text: Can't wait to review for my YouTube channel. Drunken Dadbod

name: Deb Walls
text: Nice place with a great Tuesday night bartender too!

resp.text: Thanks, Deb!  See you again soon!

name: Tammy Mills Shaughnessy
text: Love everything about this place! From the windows...to the walls! 🤣😁❤️😘

resp.text: Such kind words.  Thank you, Tammy!

name: Emerson Oliver
text:
One of the 2 best beer store in town.  Also the only decent place to get homebrewing supplies.  Im really happy they've expanded this.  It keeps me coming back.

The beer selection is great on tap and on the floor.

resp.text: Thank you, Emerson!

name: William Bohach
text:
Great selection of beer!
Very friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks, William!

name: Nate Bailie
text: Excellent selection, friendly staff, and wonderful atmosphere for a casual beer.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Nate!

name: Keith Jackson
text: great beer selection.  They only get 3/5 because they don't have mixed drinks.  You can always walk over to the sushi place for liquor.  Would go again.

resp.text: We appreciate the review, Keith.  I'm sorry you were disappointed that we do not sell mixed drinks, but in a retail establishment, on-premise liquor sales are not allowed by law in Alabama.  Only beer and wine unfortunately.  No liquor is permitted to be sold within or brought in from outside to our establishment.  Thank you.

name: Nate Bailie
text: Excellent selection, friendly staff, and wonderful atmosphere for a casual beer.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Nate!

name: Evan Hunt
text: Staff and bartender are real friendly. Selection is great. Great open seating. Good atmosphere.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Evan!  Come see us again soon!

name: Steven Allen
text: For a non beer person, pretty good selection of beer and inviting environment to be able to try a bunch of different things

resp.text: Thanks, Steven!  We have a pretty solid selection of ciders on draft and bottles/cans along with mead and some wine now.  Hope to see you again soon!

name: Parker Beckmann
text: Great place. Awesome selection and very good service!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Parker!

name: William Bohach
text:
Great selection of beer!
Very friendly staff.

resp.text: Thanks, William!

name: Jason Bodkin
text: Great beer selection and live music

resp.text: Thank you so much, Jason! We look forward to your next visit.

name: T. Barnes
text: Good selection of beer for local consumption or to go.  Also nice to have another home brew supply store.

resp.text: Thank you, Tim!  Hope to see you again soon.

name: John Tipton
text: Fun place to drink great bears, buy craft beer and homebrew supplies. Very nice owners and employees!

resp.text: Thank you, John!  Come see us again soon!

name: Tasha Tubbs
text: Friendly staff, VERY knowledgeable with the crafts and availability of product. Cute little hang out area

resp.text: Ah...thanks, Tasha!

name: Bradley Heichelbech
text: A lovely selection of beers on tap.   Unfortunately they are discontinuing all of their homebrew supplies

resp.text: Thank you very much, Bradley.  Come see us again soon!

name: Dawn Suiter
text: Great selection of beers, a spacious place to hang out with friends, and a nice stock of brewing supplies.

resp.text: Thank you, Dawn!

name: Sarah Levithol
text: Great selection of beer on draft. Super friendly staff that is very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Sarah!

name: Hot-headed Trinity
text: Great place to chill. Family friendly.

resp.text: Thank you very much!  See you again soon.

name: Brittany Dixon
text: Knowledgeable friendly staff, super chill environment, & fun nightly music or activities!

resp.text: Thank you, Brittany!

name: David Brundage
text: Loved the beer selection and live music.

resp.text: Thank you very much, David!  Hope to see you again very soon.

name: Joshua Lasseigne
text: Not only do they have good beer, they also have lots of homebrew supplies.

resp.text: Thank you, Joshua!

name: John R CARNELL
text: Wonderful tap room. Great Sour biers and great friends.

resp.text: Thank you, Chief!  See you again soon.

name: Tearah S
text: Love this place. Great patio and awesome selection of beer!

resp.text: Ah..  Thank you so much, Tearah!

name: Todd Henrichs
text: Huge selection, both on tap and bottles. Lots of brewing supplies and equipment too. Music not overly loud, so it's on the comfy homey side.

resp.text: Thank you, Todd!  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Trey Dickerhoff
text: Great selection, knowledgeable staff, and a good bit of homebrew supplies.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Trey!

name: Jill B (Zalphinian)
text: Never been there to get a drink, but I've gone with friends to get home brew supplies. They staff has always been friendly and helpful.

resp.text: Thank you, Jill!  Come have a beer with us sometime!

name: Trey Dickerhoff
text: Great selection, knowledgeable staff, and a good bit of homebrew supplies.

resp.text: Thank you very much, Trey!

name: Todd Henrichs
text: Huge selection, both on tap and bottles. Lots of brewing supplies and equipment too. Music not overly loud, so it's on the comfy homey side.

resp.text: Thank you, Todd!  Hope to see you again soon.

name: Brandon Mader
text: Strong beer selection and homebrew supplies. Nice people

resp.text: Thank you, Brandon!

name: George Preussel
text: The best no joke Chris and Greg are the reason to come.  The beer is the reason to stay.

resp.text: Cheers, George!

name: Paul terry
text: Fair selection of homebrew supplies. Staff could be more eager.

resp.text: Thank you, Paul.  I'll be sure to speak with our staff on their attentiveness.

text: Has a great atmosphere and good place to get away from crowds.

resp.text: Thank you, Walker!

name: Curtis Dinkel
text: Best hot dogs in town!

resp.text: Heck yeah!  Thanks, Curtis.  Will be adding some other food items soon!

name: Mariana
text: Great selection of local and other unique beers, bottled or on tap.

resp.text: Thanks you, Mariana!

name: Bart Carpenter
text: Good selection of beer on tap, and supplies for the home-brewer. Closes too early.

resp.text: Thank you, Jacob.  We have later hours now.  Cheers!

name: Bart Carpenter
text: Good selection of beer on tap, and supplies for the home-brewer. Closes too early.

resp.text: Thank you, Jacob.  We have later hours now.  Cheers!

resp.text: Really appreciate the kind words, Caleb.  See you again soon!

name: Dee Witt

name: Chris Bramon
text: Great place, fab beer selection!

resp.text: Yay!  Thanks so much, Chris!
